column3: Seriously; Why does this keep happening Jax?
Hey; mister; yoohoo; do you hear me?
Everytime I find you; you just get ripped away again and again.
How can I bring people justice when I’m this useless; damnit…
-Alright; enough with this. Idiot. If you’re worried about your friend; don't be. Pyrina ain’t gonna let anything happen to him.
So snap out of it; wake the hell up; and help deal with the enemies around us.
I-sorry. Right; the fairies; have to stop the fairies...
